name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.N₁_obj_X
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
X : CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject C
⊢ Eq (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.N₁.obj X).X (AlgebraicTopology.AlternatingFaceMapComplex.obj X)
decl:
/-- The functor `SimplicialObject C ⥤ Karoubi (ChainComplex C ℕ)` which maps
`X` to the formal direct factor of `K[X]` defined by `PInfty`. -/
@[simps]
def N₁ : SimplicialObject C ⥤ Karoubi (ChainComplex C ℕ) where
  obj X :=
    { X := AlternatingFaceMapComplex.obj X
      p := PInfty
      idem := PInfty_idem }
  map f :=
    { f := PInfty ≫ AlternatingFaceMapComplex.map f }

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.N₁_map_f
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
X✝ Y✝ : CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject C
f : Quiver.Hom X✝ Y✝
⊢ Eq (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.N₁.map f).f (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInfty (AlgebraicTopology.AlternatingFaceMapComplex.map f))
decl:
/-- The functor `SimplicialObject C ⥤ Karoubi (ChainComplex C ℕ)` which maps
`X` to the formal direct factor of `K[X]` defined by `PInfty`. -/
@[simps]
def N₁ : SimplicialObject C ⥤ Karoubi (ChainComplex C ℕ) where

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.N₂_obj_p_f
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
P : CategoryTheory.Idempotents.Karoubi (CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject C)
i : Nat
⊢ Eq ((AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.N₂.obj P).p.f i) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInfty.f i) (P.p.app { unop := SimplexCategory.mk i }))
decl:
/-- The extension of `N₁` to the Karoubi envelope of `SimplicialObject C`. -/
@[simps!]
def N₂ : Karoubi (SimplicialObject C) ⥤ Karoubi (ChainComplex C ℕ) :=
  (functorExtension₁ _ _).obj N₁

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.N₂_obj_X_d
initialProofState:

P : CategoryTheory.Idempotents.Karoubi (CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject C)
i j : Nat
⊢ Eq ((AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.N₂.obj P).X.d i j) (dite (Eq i (HAdd.hAdd j 1)) (fun h => CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.eqToHom ⋯) (Finset.univ.sum fun i => HSMul.hSMul (HPow.hPow (-1) ↑i) (P.X.δ i))) fun h => 0)
decl:
/-- The extension of `N₁` to the Karoubi envelope of `SimplicialObject C`. -/
@[simps!]
def N₂ : Karoubi (SimplicialObject C) ⥤ Karoubi (ChainComplex C ℕ) :=

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.toKaroubiCompN₂IsoN₁_hom_app
initialProofState:

⊢ Eq (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.toKaroubiCompN₂IsoN₁.hom.app X).f AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInfty

lemma toKaroubiCompN₂IsoN₁_hom_app (X : SimplicialObject C) :
